item.title: Version 1.1.17
item.description:
What’s New in v1.1.17+44 1.Active scenario shown on Settings page 2.Operator & alliance info listed with active periods 3.Only deals from the selected scenario are displayed 4.Unified number formatting: 4–6 digits → full number 7–9 digits → M (2 decimals) 10–12 digits → B (2 decimals) 5.“Clear All” button added to deal status filter
Fixes: 1.Corrected country deal counts 2.Faster login (2–5s) 3.Days to expire calculation fixed, including leap years 4.Standardized deal card formatting 5.The application now fully supports devices with a 16KB memory page size, ensuring improved performance and stability on a broader range of hardware
